title: MMS Preventive Maintenance Compliance
description: Compliance dashboard for preventive maintenance scheduling, adherence, and performance tracking

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  (COUNT(CASE WHEN wo.status = 'COMPLETED' THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / 
   NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT pm.id), 0)) as compliance_rate 
FROM preventive_maintenance pm 
LEFT JOIN schedule s ON pm.schedule_id = s.id 
LEFT JOIN work_order wo ON wo.parent_preventive_maintenance_id = pm.id 
WHERE s.ends_on >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND s.ends_on <= $__timeTo() 
  AND s.disabled = false

SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT pm.id) as total_pm_tasks 
FROM preventive_maintenance pm 
LEFT JOIN schedule s ON pm.schedule_id = s.id 
WHERE s.ends_on >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND s.ends_on <= $__timeTo() 
  AND s.disabled = false

SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT wo.id) as completed_pm_tasks 
FROM preventive_maintenance pm 
JOIN schedule s ON pm.schedule_id = s.id 
JOIN work_order wo ON wo.parent_preventive_maintenance_id = pm.id 
WHERE wo.status = 'COMPLETED' 
  AND s.ends_on >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND s.ends_on <= $__timeTo() 
  AND s.disabled = false

SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT pm.id) as overdue_pm_tasks 
FROM preventive_maintenance pm 
JOIN schedule s ON pm.schedule_id = s.id 
LEFT JOIN work_order wo ON wo.parent_preventive_maintenance_id = pm.id 
WHERE s.ends_on < NOW() 
  AND (wo.status IS NULL OR wo.status NOT IN ('COMPLETED', 'CANCELLED')) 
  AND s.ends_on >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND s.ends_on <= $__timeTo() 
  AND s.disabled = false

SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT pm.id) as upcoming_pm_tasks 
FROM preventive_maintenance pm 
JOIN schedule s ON pm.schedule_id = s.id 
LEFT JOIN work_order wo ON wo.parent_preventive_maintenance_id = pm.id 
WHERE s.ends_on >= NOW() 
  AND s.ends_on <= NOW() + INTERVAL '30 days' 
  AND (wo.status IS NULL OR wo.status NOT IN ('COMPLETED', 'CANCELLED')) 
  AND s.disabled = false

SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC('week', s.ends_on) as time,
  (COUNT(CASE WHEN wo.status = 'COMPLETED' THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / 
   NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT pm.id), 0)) as compliance_rate
FROM preventive_maintenance pm
JOIN schedule s ON pm.schedule_id = s.id
LEFT JOIN work_order wo ON wo.parent_preventive_maintenance_id = pm.id
WHERE s.ends_on >= $__timeFrom()
  AND s.ends_on <= $__timeTo()
  AND s.disabled = false
GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('week', s.ends_on)
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  COALESCE(wo.status, 'NOT_STARTED') as status,
  COUNT(DISTINCT pm.id) as count
FROM preventive_maintenance pm
JOIN schedule s ON pm.schedule_id = s.id
LEFT JOIN work_order wo ON wo.parent_preventive_maintenance_id = pm.id
WHERE s.ends_on >= $__timeFrom()
  AND s.ends_on <= $__timeTo()
  AND s.disabled = false
GROUP BY wo.status
ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT 
  a.name as asset_name,
  a.custom_id as asset_id,
  COUNT(DISTINCT pm.id) as total_tasks,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN wo.status = 'COMPLETED' THEN 1 END) as completed_tasks,
  (COUNT(CASE WHEN wo.status = 'COMPLETED' THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / 
   NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT pm.id), 0)) as compliance_rate
FROM preventive_maintenance pm
JOIN schedule s ON pm.schedule_id = s.id
LEFT JOIN work_order wo ON wo.parent_preventive_maintenance_id = pm.id
LEFT JOIN asset a ON pm.asset_id = a.id
WHERE s.ends_on >= $__timeFrom()
  AND s.ends_on <= $__timeTo()
  AND s.disabled = false
GROUP BY a.name, a.custom_id
ORDER BY compliance_rate ASC
LIMIT 20

SELECT 
  s.recurrence_type as frequency,
  COUNT(DISTINCT pm.id) as task_count,
  AVG(s.frequency) as avg_days
FROM preventive_maintenance pm
JOIN schedule s ON pm.schedule_id = s.id
WHERE s.disabled = false
GROUP BY s.recurrence_type
ORDER BY task_count DESC

SELECT 
  pm.name as pm_name,
  a.name as asset_name,
  a.custom_id as asset_id,
  s.ends_on as due_date,
  COALESCE(wo.status, 'NOT_STARTED') as status,
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (s.ends_on - NOW())) / 86400 as days_until_due
FROM preventive_maintenance pm
JOIN schedule s ON pm.schedule_id = s.id
LEFT JOIN work_order wo ON wo.parent_preventive_maintenance_id = pm.id
LEFT JOIN asset a ON pm.asset_id = a.id
WHERE s.ends_on >= NOW()
  AND s.ends_on <= NOW() + INTERVAL '30 days'
  AND (wo.status IS NULL OR wo.status NOT IN ('COMPLETED', 'CANCELLED'))
  AND s.disabled = false
ORDER BY s.ends_on ASC
LIMIT 50
